Mr. Alexander,

  Aikidoka, Kendoka, and Iaidoka all mean "one who practices ____"  (Aikido, 
Kendo, or Iaido depending on the root word).  Generally the -ka suffix 
attached to the name of a style of martial arts means "practicioner."
  I hope that helped.


Peace,

Matt
